question_text:
Question 18  
 
  
 
[Machine : Transformer]
Which one of the following options represents possible voltage polarities in a single phase two winding
transformer? Here. 
p
V
   is the applied primary voltage. 
p
E
  is the induced primary voltage. 
s
V
   is the open
circuit secondary voltage, and 
s
E
  is the induced secondary voltage.
(A)
(B)


PAGE
19

(C)
(D)
